Name: Bar Braai

Review Text: We found the burgers and fries delicious here! The staff was nice and welcoming and the service was very good. Definitely recommend to come here if you come close by Westerpark!

Name: Bar Braai
Review Text: Delicious food! We‚Äôve been ordering here quite some times and the quality is excellent.

Name: Bar Braai
Review Text: I miss Braai. I moved away from Amsterdam nearly 2 years ago and haven't found a match. Food is excellent. Very friendly staff, shared a drink after their (food) shift ended.

Name: Bar Braai

Review Text: Outstanding service and great food. The staff are super friendly. It took our starters a while to arrive due to a party that needed to be served. We understood, but they gave us a round of drinks on the house anyway.

Name: Bar Braai
Review Text: A lovely place. We drunk 2 big beers and we asked for some chips and they brought us a kilogram of nachos that I adored! You can also stay outside where u can find tables! Enjoy it!

Name: Bar Braai
Review Text: Great food, ribs were really nice. Good drinks selection and cocktails as well. Atmosphere was cool and the server was friendly and gave fast service.

Name: Bar Braai
Review Text: Tasty, cheap, cosy! The ribs are to die for, but the one that stole the show was the pork belly! It melted on my tongue and it was really delicious!

Name: Bar Braai
Review Text: Brilliant little restaurant next to westerpark Park. BRAAI serves great craft beers, ciders and food of all kinds. From the nachos to the burger or smoked sweet potatoes, I loved our meal.
